name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Together: Animes, Videos, Movies and +

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch any video content on the web in real time with your friends

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever thought of watching an anime, movie, or video with your friends and wished you could watch it together synchronously?

Well, this extension is perfect for you!
It works on almost every video-based website and provides a platform to watch any type of audiovisual content together with unlimited people. In that sense, the main features include: private room creation, synced pause and play, synced timestamp, and synced time forwarding/backwarding.
